goal.ch: 本課程主要目的在增進同學們對測驗與評量之基礎知識，並培養同學運用課室評量之能力，以符合十二年國教對於教師的期待。課程主題包括教學與評量計畫、課室評量的設計、古典測驗理論相關重要概念，以及評量結果報告等議題。同時，同學將藉由評量工具撰寫與試題分析之實作，強化自身對於評量工具開發的技能，以期奠定學生未來在教學上使用學習評量的專業知能。
goal.en: The main purpose of this course is to enhance students‘ basic knowledge of testing and assessment and to develop students‘ ability to use classroom assessment to meet the expectations of the 12-year national education for teachers. Course topics include teaching and assessment planning, classroom assessment design, key concepts related to classical test theory, and assessment result reporting. At the same time, students will strengthen their skills in assessment tool development through the practice of writing assessment tools and test item analysis, laying the foundation for students‘ professional knowledge in using learning assessments in future teaching.
